activity.title: beckn/gtfs-to-beckn#1
activity.text:
Hello @ravi-prakash-v, I am Kumar Saurabh , a 3rd year undergrad at National Institute of Technology (NIT) Jalandhar, punjab.
I am a Full Stack Developer, having strong foundation in Frontend and Backend Technologies with hands on Experience in developing projects from scratch.
This is my plan for completing this issue--

->Understand GTFS Structure
Review GTFS files (e.g., routes.txt, trips.txt, stop_times.txt, etc.) and their interdependencies.

->Design CMS UI
Build a React-based UI for listing, editing, uploading, and deleting GTFS data in table format.

->Backend API Setup (Node.js)
Create APIs to:

->Parse GTFS ZIP uploads and store data (preferably in a temporary DB or in-memory structure).

->Read data as tables.

->Update specific cells.

->Delete rows with cascade effects across linked files.

->Validate and store uploaded GTFS files.

->Frontend Features (React)

->Table views for each GTFS file.

->Inline editing of cells.

->Row deletion with warning prompts for linked updates.

->Upload interface with progress and validation feedback.

->Validation & Propagation

->Implement logic to ensure updates/deletions are consistent across files (e.g., deleting a trip should update stop_times).

Also designed a flowchart using Excalidraw to implement this plan..
Please Assign me this issue, would love to work on it.
